text: Goldobin () is a Russian masculine surname originating either from goldoba (meaning beggar) or from голдобина (meaning a pit); its feminine counterpart is Goldobina. It may refer to *Nikolay Goldobin (born 1995), Russian ice hockey right winger *Tatiana Goldobina (born 1975), Russian sports shooter ==References== Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Goldobin
